regen.absent_element: condition for entering Normal Startup Mode
regen.new_specification: If the TCS software was halted normally, then upon application of power, the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode.

regen.absent_element: situation with normal termination leading to Normal Startup Mode
regen.new_specification: When the TCS software is halted normally, the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode upon application of power.

label: When the TCS Software is terminated normally the TCS shall enter the Normal Startup Mode of operation upon application of power.
absence: situation of the TCS Software is terminated normally
